total_subquestions_ys: Q1: Identify the cells that are not part of a group of the same color (6 in this case) and are not already colored (5 in this case).
Q2: Change the color of the cells identified in Q1 to 5.
Q3: Ensure that the cells that are part of a group of the same color (6 in this case) remain the same.
